answer.name: Yejun
answer.contents: At 10 p.m. on Thursday, six singers selected as national singers will appear and Lee Byung-chan will appear. It is an entertainment program that plays games and sings.

name: Yejun
title: Where is the MBTI personality type test?

answer.name: Siwoo
answer.contents: The MBTI test is conducted by IDRLabs. â€‹

title: How do I reply to Instagram DM?
name: Hajun

answer.name: Hyunsoo
answer.contents: If you look at people's stories, there's an airplane sign on the bottom right If you press it to reply or if you didn't block the reply function, there's a bar at the bottom of the story. Click it, type it, and press Send.

title: Why is the temperature of the cpu increasing after the computer starts? My cpu model is 5800x!
name: Junwoo

answer.name: Neal
answer.contents: There's a high possibility that it's a board problem. Other than changing parts and testing them out, all you can see is to see if the condenser is swollen I think it would be better to replace the parts if they are available, and I don't think it's an old board, so I think there's a way to send them as well.

answer.name: Seungwoo
answer.contents: The 5800x has more heat than other cpu. The performance of the cooler is that important, so please consider that.

title: Why does the calendar day order start from Sunday?
name: Yujun

answer.name: Seunghyun
answer.contents: The reason why the calendar day starts Sunday was recorded in Hebrew as 'starting Sunday week' in Judaism[Yom Rishon] And so that's what we see in Christianity, starting with Sunday.

answer.name: Neal
answer.contents: That's because the first person to make the calendar was a Catholic priest.

title: The emergency disaster text message service always sends me messages about the area I was in. So how do they know I'm in the area for emergency text messaging services?
name: Junseo

answer.name: Jiyeon
answer.contents: The Ministry of Public Administration and Security uses the cell broadcasting service (CBS) function of the mobile phone to deliver related information to CBS-enabled mobile phones in areas where disaster situations are expected or occurred.

title: What is 5g internet? Is wired internet 5g too?
name: Yeonwoo

answer.name: Yeseo
answer.contents: 5G in WiFi refers to the 5GHz frequency band, 5G in wired refers to the 5Gbps bandwidth, and 5G in mobile communication refers to the 5G generation, which is very different.

title: I'm curious why you're covering the brand on TV.
name: Neal

answer.name: Yeonwoo
answer.contents: This is to prevent indirect advertising because of the law written in the Enforcement Decree of the Broadcasting Act, and if it is indirectly promoted even though it is not sponsored, it is to prevent indirect advertising and advertising because it damages people who are curious about it.

title: Why do you have to block the light when you're unwinding clams?
name: Neal

answer.name: Jungsik
answer.contents: The reason why they cut off the light is because they create a similar environment where they lived (such as in a hole or in the ocean) and when they cut off the light, they spit out the shell very well.

answer.name: Hyunsoo
answer.contents: It's because it's more active when you block out the light.

title: I'm curious about the origin of the enoki mushroom
name: Neal

answer.name: Zakoo
answer.contents: The name of enoki mushroom was given because it is said to grow on a dried enoki tree. It is characterized by growing well at a temperature of 10 to 15 degrees Celsius. Enoki mushrooms are also called winter mushrooms because they grow well in places with lower temperatures than other mushrooms.

title: I keep hearing the sound of the machine every night in the accommodation. Where should I talk about this kind of problem?
name: Romi

answer.name: Ohjoong
answer.contents: I hear that sound, too. It sounds like from washing machine

answer.name: Pasta
answer.contents: If you're having a hard time because of the sound, would you like to call the duty office of the dormitory operation team on the 1st floor of the dormitory 13th building? They'll check the site!

title: Did you all get a scholarship?

title: Where did the mentees who use the outside accommodation receive the pass? I can't find the notice.

title: The National Employment Support System wants attendance documents, so can I get the evidence that I've been attending?
